languages.text: "Но защищает лишь тех, кто чист душой. Думаешь, ты — од{mf|ин|на} из них, {mf|сыне|дщерь}? Будь осторож{mf|ен|на} с этим убеждением. Многие вознесшиеся на высоты веры пали с них в объятья греховной гордыни".

traits.locale_text: "Но защищает лишь тех, кто чист душой. Думаешь, ты — од{mf|ин|на} из них, {mf|сыне|дщерь}?"

languages.text: "But He protects only those who are pure of heart. Do you think yourself one of them? Be leery of this conviction of yours. Many who have risen to the pinnacle of faith have fallen from it into the embrace of pride most degenerate."
languages.original_text: "Но защищает лишь тех, кто чист душой. Думаешь, ты — од{mf|ин|на} из них, {mf|сыне|дщерь}? Будь осторож{mf|ен|на} с этим убеждением. Многие вознесшиеся на высоты веры пали с них в объятья греховной гордыни".

traits.locale_text: "But He protects only those who are pure of heart. Do you think yourself one of them, my {mf|son|daughter}? Be leery of this conviction of yours. Many who have risen to the pinnacle of faith have fallen from it into the embrace of pride most sinful."
"But He protects only those who are pure of heart. Do you think yourself one of them, {mf|son|daughter}?"

"But He protects only those who are pure of heart. Do you think yourself one of them, my {mf|son|daughter}? Be leery of this conviction of yours. Many who have risen to the pinnacle of faith have fallen from it into the embrace of pride most sinful."
"But He protects only those who are pure of heart. Do you think yourself one of them, my {mf|son|daughter}?"

"But He protects only those who are pure of heart. Do you think yourself one of them, my {mf|son|daughter}? Be leery of this conviction of yours. Many who have risen to the pinnacle of faith have fallen from it into the embrace of pride most sinful."

"But He protects only those who are pure of heart. Do you think yourself one of them? Be leery of this conviction of yours. Many who have risen to the pinnacle of faith have fallen from it into the embrace of pride most degenerate."

languages.text: “不过，祂实际上只会保佑那些心灵纯洁的人。你认为你也是其中的一员吗？如果你心怀这种信念，那务必要保持警惕。许多本已擢升至信仰巅峰的人，都是由于受到傲慢大罪的迷惑，从上面跌落了下来。”
languages.original_text: "But He protects only those who are pure of heart. Do you think yourself one of them? Be leery of this conviction of yours. Many who have risen to the pinnacle of faith have fallen from it into the embrace of pride most degenerate."

traits.locale_text: “不过，祂实际上只会保佑那些心灵纯洁的人。你认为你也是其中的一员吗，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}？如果你心怀这种信念，那务必要保持警惕。许多本已擢升至信仰巅峰的人，都是由于受到傲慢大罪的迷惑，从上面跌落了下来。”

languages.text: «Pero solo protege a quienes tienen un corazón puro. ¿Cree que se cuenta entre ellos? Le recomiendo recelar de semejante convicción, pues he visto a muchos ascender al pináculo de la fe para posteriormente sucumbir en los brazos del orgullo más degenerado».
languages.original_text: "But He protects only those who are pure of heart. Do you think yourself one of them? Be leery of this conviction of yours. Many who have risen to the pinnacle of faith have fallen from it into the embrace of pride most degenerate."

traits.locale_text: «Salvo que Él únicamente protege a quienes tienen un corazón puro. ¿Cree que se cuenta entre ellos, {mf|hijo|hija} mí{mf|o|a}? Le recomiendo recelar de semejante convicción, pues he visto a muchos ascender al pináculo de la fe para posteriormente sucumbir en los brazos del orgullo más pecaminoso».

languages.text: 「ですが、主は純粋な心を持つ者しか祝福しません。あなたはご自身をそのような心の持ち主であると信じておいででしょうか？そのような確信には用心なされませ。信仰の頂点に上り詰めた者の多くが、もっとも罪深い傲慢さを発揮して堕落するのです」
languages.original_text: "But He protects only those who are pure of heart. Do you think yourself one of them? Be leery of this conviction of yours. Many who have risen to the pinnacle of faith have fallen from it into the embrace of pride most degenerate."

traits.locale_text: 「ですが、主は純粋な心を持つ者しか祝福しません。あなたはご自身をそのような心の持ち主であると信じておいででしょうか？そのような確信には用心なされませ。信仰の頂点に上り詰めた者の多くが、もっとも罪深い傲慢さを発揮して堕落するのです」

languages.text: "Aber er schützt nur jene, die reinen Herzens sind. Haltet Ihr Euch für {mf|einen|eine} von ihnen? Ihr solltet dieser Überzeugung misstrauen. Viele, die den Gipfel des Glaubens erklommen haben, sind von dort in die Fänge des sündigen Hochmuts gestürzt."
languages.original_text: "But He protects only those who are pure of heart. Do you think yourself one of them? Be leery of this conviction of yours. Many who have risen to the pinnacle of faith have fallen from it into the embrace of pride most degenerate."

traits.locale_text: "Aber er schützt nur die, die reinen Herzens sind. Gehört Ihr dazu, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}? Ihr solltet dieser Überzeugung misstrauen. Viele, die den Gipfel des Glaubens erklommen haben, sind von dort in die Fänge des sündigen Hochmuts gestürzt."

languages.text: « Il ne protège que ceux et celles dont le cœur est pur. Pensez-vous être dans ce cas ? Méfiez-vous de ce genre de conviction. Parmi ceux qui atteignent le sommet de la foi, beaucoup chutent ensuite en tombant sous l'emprise de l'orgueil. »
languages.original_text: "But He protects only those who are pure of heart. Do you think yourself one of them? Be leery of this conviction of yours. Many who have risen to the pinnacle of faith have fallen from it into the embrace of pride most degenerate."

traits.locale_text: « Il ne protège que ceux et celles dont le cœur est pur. Pensez-vous être dans ce cas, {mf|mon fils|ma fille} ? Méfiez-vous de ce genre de conviction. Parmi ceux qui atteignent le sommet de la foi, beaucoup chutent ensuite en tombant sous l'emprise d'un terrible péché, l'orgueil. »

languages.text: "O yalnızca kalbi saf olanları korur. Kendini onlardan mı sayıyorsun? Bu kanaatine temkinli yaklaş bence. İmanın doruk noktasına ulaştıktan sonra tepetaklak devrilip kendini kibirlerin en beterinin kucağında bulanlar çoktur."
languages.original_text: "But He protects only those who are pure of heart. Do you think yourself one of them? Be leery of this conviction of yours. Many who have risen to the pinnacle of faith have fallen from it into the embrace of pride most degenerate."

traits.locale_text: "O yalnızca kalbi saf olanları korur. Sen kendini onlardan biri sayıyor musun? Böyle bir inanca karşı temkinli ol. İmanın doruk noktasına ulaştıktan sonra tepetaklak devrilip kendini kibirlerin en beterinin kucağında bulanlar çoktur."
